columns.ID: The unique identifier for each city.
columns.Name: The name of the city.
columns.CountryCode: The code identifying the country of the city.
columns.District: The district where the city is located.
columns.Population: The total population of the city.

city.table_description: The table contains information about cities across different countries.

columns.Language: The language spoken in the country.
columns.IsOfficial: The status of the language as official or not.
columns.Percentage: The percentage of the population speaking the language.

countrylanguage.table_description: The table contains languages spoken in each country along with their official status.

columns.Code: The unique identifier for each country.
columns.Name: The name of the country.
columns.Continent: The continent where the country is located.
columns.Region: The geographic region of the country.
columns.SurfaceArea: The total area of the country in square kilometers.
columns.IndepYear: The year the country gained independence.
columns.Population: The total population living in the country.
columns.LifeExpectancy: The average lifespan of individuals in the country.
columns.GNP: The Gross National Product of the country.
columns.GNPOld: The previous Gross National Product of the country.
columns.LocalName: The name of the country in its official language.
columns.GovernmentForm: The political system governing the country.
columns.HeadOfState: The title of the current leader of the country.
columns.Capital: The identifier for the country's capital city.

country.table_description: The table provides detailed information about various countries.
